channel.title: Help me please run error
channel.description:
when i try to run my client this is what happens [code]The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
heres whats inside my run @echo off Title Client cd ./ "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause how do i fix this please help

item.title: Help me please run error
item.dc:creator: @Yankees1 Yankees_
item.description:
@Yankees1 wrote:

when i try to run my client this is what happens

The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .

heres whats inside my run
@echo off
Title Client
cd ./
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause
how do i fix this please help
